articles.content: OpenAI is in advanced talks with former Apple designer Sir Jony Ive and SoftBanks Masayoshi Son to launch a venture to build the iPhone of artificial intelligence, fuelled by more than $1bn in fundin… [+3005 chars]

articles.title: First sketches of the new Kodiaq - ŠKODA Storyboard
articles.description: The new generation of the popular Škoda Kodiaq SUV will soon be revealed in all its glory. It will build on the success of both its predecessor and other Škoda SUVs.
articles.content: The modern era of koda SUVs began in 2009 with the compact Yeti, which was succeeded by the Karoq. The Yeti is still the third most popular koda SUV ever, with over 684,000 of them hitting the road. … [+635 chars]
